mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To create and maintain a safe, empowering, and supportive digital sanctuary for women. We believe everyone deserves a space where they can feel heard, find reliable information, and access help without judgment. SafeSphere is our commitment to that belief.

privacy.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
privacy.text: Your safety and privacy are the cornerstones of SafeSphere. We are deeply committed to protecting your anonymity.

item1.title: Anonymous Conversations
item1.text: All chats with our AI guide, Sphere, are anonymous. We do not store personally identifiable information from your conversations.

item2.title: Data Protection
item2.text: We employ robust security measures to protect the platform and ensure your experience is secure.

item3.title: Transparency
item3.text: We believe in being open about how our platform works. Our Privacy Policy is written in plain language to be as clear as possible.

team.title: The People Behind the Project
team.text: SafeSphere was built by a dedicated team of developers, designers, and advocates who are passionate about leveraging technology for social good. While we maintain our privacy to focus on the mission, know that this platform is built with care, empathy, and a deep understanding of the need for safe digital spaces.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to SafeSphere. Your privacy and safety are extremely important to us. This policy explains what information we collect and how we protect it. We've tried to make it as clear and simple as possible.

section1.title: 1. Information We Do NOT Collect
section1.text: We are committed to your anonymity. We have designed SafeSphere to operate without collecting personal information from you.

item1.title: Chat Conversations
item1.text: Your conversations with our AI chatbot, Sphere, are processed in real-time but are not stored in a way that is linked to any personal identifier. We do not ask for your name, email, or any other contact information.

item2.title: Personal Data
item2.text: We do not require you to create an account. We do not collect or store your name, email address, physical address, phone number, or IP address.

section2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section2.text: We collect minimal, non-personally identifiable information to improve our service.

item1.title: Anonymous Usage Data
item1.text: We may collect anonymous data about how you use the website, such as which pages are visited most often. This helps us understand what features are most helpful, but this data is aggregated and cannot be used to identify you.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Information
section3.text: The limited anonymous information we collect is used solely for the purpose of operating and improving SafeSphere. We use it to:
section3.item1: Understand user needs and improve the website's functionality.
section3.item2: Ensure the stability and security of our platform.

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.text: We do not sell, trade, or rent any user information to others. Because we do not collect personally identifiable information, there is nothing for us to share.

section5.title: 5. Quick Exit Feature
section5.text: Our "Quick Exit" feature is designed to enhance your safety. When used, it immediately redirects you to a neutral website (like Google) and clears the current page from your browser's session history, making it harder for someone to see you were on our site using the "back" button.

section6.title: 6. Contact Us
section6.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please use our Contact Form. Please do not send sensitive information through this form.
